subject: AI & Agents
title: GitHub Copilot: AI Writes Code
description: A quick win: understand GitHub Copilot: AI Writes Code.

hook.text: A developer types a comment: 'sort array by date.' AI writes the function instantly. It's correct.

buildup.text: GitHub Copilot uses a model trained on billions of lines of open-source code.

discovery.text: It predicts not just the next line but entire functions, classes, and test cases from context.

twist.text: Developers accepted about 30% of Copilot's suggestions. It's a collaborator, not a replacement.

climax.text: Studies show developers using Copilot complete tasks 55% faster on certain types of coding work.

punchline.text: The pair programmer that never sleeps, never argues, and sometimes writes bugs.

quiz.question: What percentage of Copilot's suggestions do developers typically accept?
